name: zombie-cucumber
description: Template pra usar Cucumberjs com Nightwatch

scripts.test: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js --require steps --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty --format json:report/cucumber_report.json
scripts.test:ci: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js --require steps --format node_modules/cucumber-pretty --require env=headless
